snippet: After a bout of criticism, leaders in a small Iowa town called off plans to sell $5 raffle tickets for a chance to use a Taser stun gun on a city official.
abstract: Officials in Van Meter, Iowa, cancel raffle to raise money for new police car that would have given winner permission to use Taser stun gun on a city official.
lead_paragraph: After a bout of criticism, leaders in a small Iowa town called off plans to sell $5 raffle tickets for a chance to use a Taser stun gun on a city official.

headline.main: Iowa: Town Backs Off Plan to Raffle Chance to Use a Taser
headline.print_headline: Iowa: Town Backs Off Plan to Raffle Chance to Use a Taser
